sentence.Network_en: His dream may recall to us Rimbaud's'Le Bateau ivre ', which itself derived from Poe.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的梦使我们想起兰波的《醉舟》, 这首诗的本身也得之于坡.

sentence.Network_en: The bow of bateau is man of Taiwan.

sentence.Network_en: The life is the sea horizon, the person is the one leaf bateau on the sea.
sentence.Network_cn: 生活是一望无际的大海, 人便是大海上的一叶小舟.
